Spears::

Computer scan:
Chip is linked into thought proceeses and motor control. 
Also linked to autodestruct mechanism inside of bot.
Removal may result in self destruct sequence.  
Must disarm chip before removal.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Off to Chemistry. *sigh*
> 
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm finds the chip, about to remove it when he hesitates. What 
if 
> it had tied into her systems so much that removal would be fatal?
> 
> Turning in his chair, Firearm taps a few buttons, starting a scan 
of 
> Spears and the chip.
